title: CoinSpotlight
description: Coin Spotlight is a web application that provides real-time cryptocurrency prices. Users can click on any coin to view detailed information about it. The project is built using React and fetches data from the CoinGecko API.

title: BistroBite
description: This project is a responsive web page for a restaurant, designed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It ensures an optimal viewing experience across various devices, adapting seamlessly to different screen sizes.

title: LapMart
description: LapMart is a responsive e-commerce website for selling laptops, built with React and styled using Tailwind CSS. The site provides a user-friendly interface that adjusts smoothly to different screen sizes

title: TODO APP
description: The To-Do App is a task management application built with React and Node.js, featuring particle effects for enhanced visual appeal. Users can create, manage, and track tasks within the app's intuitive interface.
